dmca.title: RE: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3351207H] http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

Please find a DMCA signed notification below for each of our clients.

The Planet hosts http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net
  
The following emails have been sent as the site is offering direct links to
illegal streaming of our clients audiovisual content. This is termed a
contributory copyright infringement. The page on the site offering these
links is found here: http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/?f=819447

The rights that this site is infringing includes links to illegal UEFA
content (a client of ours).
 
http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/?t=5563978  
 
Please advise your client to remove all links to our client's audiovisual
material and if they do not comply remove the site.

Formal Declaration


I hereby state that UEFA is the owner of the exclusive rights referenced
above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf with respect to
internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of UEFA I hereby state that I
have a good faith belief that use of the content in the manner complained of
is not authorised by UEFA, its agents, or the law.

I, Tim Cooper, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this
e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States
of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the
information in the notice is accurate.

Regards,

Tim

-----Original Message-----
From: zzzzzz [mailto:dmca@theplanet.com] 
Sent: 07 March 2007 18:15
To: TimC@nr-online.com
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3351207H]
http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net


To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

Dear Sirs, 
 
  
 
Please note the three Cease & Desist (DMCA signed) emails sent to 
abuse@theplanet.com by NetResult regarding a site that The Planet hosts 
http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net 
<http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/>  (copies of each C&D
attached). 
 
  
 
The following emails have been sent as the site is offering direct links
to 
illegal streaming of our clients audiovisual content. This is termed a 
contributory copyright infringement. The page on the site offering these

links is found here: http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/?f=819447

 
  
 
The rights that this site is infringing include La Liga, FA Premier
League 
and UEFA content each one a client of ours. 
 
  
 
C&D sent 06/03/07 - Premier League - 
<http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/?t=4946447> 
http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/?t=4946447 
 
  
 
C&D sent 06/03/07 - La Liga - 
http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/?t=4927054 
 
  
 
C&D sent 13/12/06 - UEFA - 
http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net/?t=5563978  
 
  
 
Please advise your client to remove all links to our client's
audiovisual 
material and if they do not comply remove the site. 
 
  
 
Regards, 
 
  
 
Tim 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
 
 
NetResult 
 
  
 
  
 
 
 
Tim Cooper
